pageContext.claim: “All my life, I've been committed to advancing fairness and opportunity for the African American community. And today, I am here before you with the empty -- and we have to say, we've had so many people with empty political rhetoric.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump seems to believe this — he regularly says he is not ‘racist.’ But racist tropes have made their way into Trump’s language and actions on multiple occasions. Most recently, the president tweeted that four Democratic minority Congresswomen — all Americans — should “go back” to where they came from. Washington Post Executive Editor Martin Baron noted in a statement, ”The ‘go back’ trope is deeply rooted in the history of racism in the United States. Therefore, we have concluded that ‘racist’ is the proper term to apply to the language [Trump] used [in his tweets].”
